thread.title: Christopher & Banks Corporation Announces Reporting Date for Fiscal 2017 Fourth Quarter and Full Year Results

author: cnbc.com
title: Christopher & Banks Corporation Announces Reporting Date for Fiscal 2017 Fourth Quarter and Full Year Results

organizations.name: about christopher & banks christopher & banks corporation

text:
MINNEAPOLIS--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Christopher & Banks Corporation (NYSE:CBK) today announced that it plans to report its fiscal 2017 fourth quarter and full year results on Thursday, March 8, 2018, before the market opens. The Company also plans to hold a conference call to discuss its financial results at 8:30 a.m. Eastern Time on Thursday, March 8, 2018.
A live web cast of the conference call will be available in the investor relations section of the Company’s website, www.christopherandbanks.com . A replay of the web cast will also be available following the conference call on the Company’s website for 30 days.
In addition, a replay of the call will be available shortly after the completion of the conference call through March 15, 2018. To access the telephone replay, listeners should dial 1-844-512-2921. The access code for the replay is: 13676744.
About Christopher & Banks
Christopher & Banks Corporation is a Minneapolis-based national specialty retailer featuring exclusively designed privately branded women’s apparel and accessories. As of February 22, 2018, the Company operates 462 stores in 45 states consisting of 314 MPW stores, 77 Outlet stores, 37 Christopher & Banks stores, and 34 CJ Banks stores. The Company also operates the www.ChristopherandBanks.com eCommerce website.
Keywords: Christopher & Banks, CJ Banks, Women’s Clothing, Plus Size Clothing, Petites, Extended Sizes, Outfits.
